oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analytical Statement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Mardi Gras; Mystic Memphi;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "An analytical statement showing the cost of the Celebration of Mardi Gras on March 5, 1878 by the Memphi"; shows cost of the various stages of construction of floats, cost of lights, costumes, music, tableaux and the Memphis ball; written in purple ink "respectfully submitted, Colton Greene, Gerber."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: ledger paper folded in half, 7.75 x 12.5 in.
